text: __NOTOC__ 209 (CCIX) was a common year starting on Sunday of the Julian calendar. == Events == === By place === ==== Roman Empire ==== * Publius Septimius Geta gets the titles of Imperator and Augustus from his father, emperor Septimius Severus. * Severus plans to take the land north of Scotland. The Roman army reaches Aberdeen. The Scottish tribes begin guerrilla warfare against the Romans. ==== Asia ==== * In India, beginning of the reign of Chandashri, Satavahana king of the Andhra. == Births == * Guan Lu (d. 256) * Sun Deng, eldest son of Sun Quan (d. 241) * Xiahou Xuan, minister of Wei, son of Xiahou Shang (d. 254) == Deaths == * Chen Lan, general under Yuan Shu * Jin Xuan * Liu Qi, son of Liu Biao * Saint Alban (possible death date)
